long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Small package to add a context menu when highlighting text. you need to highlight text in the first instance to see the context menu

Highlighted text will be added to the clipboard with added dashes such as 'hello foo bar world' => 'hello-foo-bar-world'

Simply created to make my life easier when taking ticket names and quickly generating branch names.
